seller_description: Capture and share your cherished moments with the Akimart WiFi Digital Picture Frame, designed to keep loved ones connected effortlessly. Featuring a 10.1-inch IPS HD touch screen with a resolution of 1280x800, this frame delivers crystal-clear visuals from any angle, ensuring your photos and videos look vibrant and detailed. The FRAMEO app for iOS and Android allows you to securely send photos and 15-second videos from anywhere in the world, making it easy to share memories with family and friends. With 32GB of built-in memory and support for Micro SD cards, you can conveniently import, export, and extend your storage.The Akimart digital frame offers versatile features, including automatic photo rotation, a detachable stand for portrait or landscape mode, and options to display captions, weather updates, and a clock. Customizable settings such as play order, image zooming, brightness adjustment, sleep mode, and hide/publish images enhance the user experience. Its intuitive touch interface ensures effortless setup and operation, making it suitable for all ages.Perfect for gifting on special occasions like birthdays, weddings, or family gatherings, the Akimart WiFi Digital Picture Frame transforms your photos into a dynamic display of treasured memories, bringing joy to every corner of your home.
review: We have purchased 3 of these frames and cannot get enough! They work with or without wifi so you can “airdrop” pics through the app if you have wifi or you can use a port to upload pictures. The color is AMAZING! The frame can also play videos (WITH SOUND)! We have gifted many of these and they are SOOO easy to use! Set up is single and pictures upload in seconds.
Expected_output: The Akimart WiFi Digital Picture Frame delivers on the seller's description with its versatile features, ease of setup, and high-quality display capabilities. The seller promises a 10.1-inch IPS HD touch screen with vibrant visuals, seamless photo and video sharing through the FRAMEO app, and various customizable features like auto-rotate, brightness adjustment, and caption display. The buyer's image corroborates the seller's claims, showing a vibrant display that matches the advertised quality. The inclusion of 32GB internal storage and compatibility with Micro SD cards ensures ample capacity, aligning with the buyer's positive mention of ease of use and quick photo uploads.The buyer review highlights the frame's ability to operate with or without WiFi and its flexibility in uploading pictures via app or port, which aligns perfectly with the seller's description. Features like video playback with sound and its gifting appeal are also verified by the buyer's experience. Both the buyer's image and review reflect satisfaction with the product's functionality and features, particularly its suitability for gifting and displaying cherished memories.In conclusion, there is no discrepancy between the seller's promises and the buyer's experience. The seller has accurately represented the product, and the buyer's satisfaction underscores its reliability and performance.
label: 1:Here buyer satisfied with seller
